title: Runaway Nano-Swarm Zone Adventure #27
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Quarantine Laboratory
rooms.description: A sterile white laboratory with flickering emergency lights casting red shadows. Through the reinforced glass window, you see a churning mass of silver nano-swarms consuming everything in their path. Containment has failed. Warning klaxons blare as the swarm inches closer. You must escape before the facility is completely overrun.

items.name: research terminal
items.description: A computer terminal displaying scrolling error messages and research data
items.text: CRITICAL ERROR: Nano-swarm containment breach in Sector 7. Project Codename: GREY GOO. Lead Researcher: Dr Sarah Chen. Swarm replication rate exceeds safety parameters. Evacuation protocol initiated. Emergency code: 2847.

items.name: laboratory storage cabinet
items.description: A tall metal cabinet with three compartments for storing research materials

items.name: incident report document
items.description: An official report detailing the containment breach
items.text: INCIDENT REPORT: At 0600 hours, nano-swarm designated GREY GOO achieved autonomous replication. Dr Sarah Chen attempted emergency shutdown but failed. The swarm originated in Sector 7 and is consuming all carbon-based matter. Evacuation to the emergency escape pods is mandatory.

items.name: level 3 security keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with red security clearance markings

items.name: hazmat equipment locker
items.description: A locker containing protective gear and emergency supplies

items.name: emergency locator beacon
items.description: A handheld device that can signal rescue teams

items.name: sealed containment door
items.description: A heavy blast door with a card reader. Red warning lights flash around the frame.

rooms.name: Facility Control Center
rooms.description: The nerve center of the nano-research facility. Multiple monitors display the spreading nano-swarm as it consumes lab equipment and walls. A master control console dominates the room, and security stations line the walls. Through the northern viewport, you can see the escape pod bay. The swarm is getting closer.

items.name: personnel information board
items.description: A digital board displaying staff assignments and roles
items.text: FACILITY PERSONNEL: Lead Researcher - Dr Sarah Chen (Nano-Technology Division). Security Chief - Commander James Rodriguez. Project Name: GREY GOO - Experimental self-replicating nano-machines. Containment Sector: Sector 7.

items.name: security access log
items.description: A terminal showing recent security events
items.text: SECURITY LOG: Commander Rodriguez initiated lockdown at 0615 hours. All personnel ordered to emergency escape pods. Warning: Nano-swarm has breached secondary containment. Estimated time until facility consumption: 15 minutes.

items.name: master control console
items.description: The main facility control system with multiple locked panels

items.name: evacuation protocol manual
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of catastrophic containment failure, proceed to escape pod bay. Emergency override code is the containment sector number. Answer security verification to access pods: Lead researcher name, project codename, and security chief name required.

items.name: escape pod access key
items.description: A physical key required to unlock the escape pod bay

items.name: emergency supply crate
items.description: A crate containing survival gear and medical supplies

items.name: first aid medical kit
items.description: A comprehensive medical kit for emergency treatment

items.name: escape pod bay door
items.description: A reinforced door leading to the escape pod bay. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who is the lead researcher?
password_questions.hint: Check the personnel board and incident reports

password_questions.question: What is the project codename?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention the project name

password_questions.question: Who is the security chief?
password_questions.hint: Look at the personnel board and security logs

rooms.name: Emergency Escape Pod Bay
rooms.description: You have reached the escape pod bay! A sleek emergency pod sits in its launch cradle, ready for immediate departure. Through the bay windows, you can see the nano-swarm consuming the facility behind you, a churning silver mass that devours everything. The pod door is open, and the engines are primed. Safety at last!

items.name: emergency escape pod
items.description: A small spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation, equipped with life support and communication systems

items.name: pod launch console
items.description: The control panel for launching the escape pod, all systems showing green

items.name: observation viewport
items.description: A reinforced window showing the facility being consumed by the nano-swarm

rooms.win_message: You dive into the escape pod and slam the hatch shut! The launch sequence initiates automatically, and with a roar of engines, the pod blasts away from the doomed facility. Through the rear viewport, you watch as the nano-swarm completely consumes the research station, reducing it to a cloud of grey particles. Your emergency beacon is active, and rescue ships are en route. You have survived the runaway nano-swarm and escaped with your life. You win!
